attributes.action: to ask Jacqui Smith and Tony McNulty to volunteer to pay the full amount in false expenses claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jacqui Smith claimed over £100000 but did not have to repay anything.
Tony McNulty only had to pay £13837 of the £72528. 
How can anyone respect these people if they do not need to pay all the money back.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament or with the individual political parties.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
